description:
Toriko, Sunny, Coco, and Komatsu brave frigid temperatures and Bison Frogs as they search for a legendary tree that`s entirely edible!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gathering of the Four Kings! A Midwinter Night`s Miracle!
Shitennou Shoushuu! Mafuyu no Yoru no Kiseki!
四天王招集! 真冬の夜の奇跡!
